content: or safety pin on the rs to help you stay row 9 k3 m1 k2 p2 twice m1 sl3wyif 16 sts oriented when you place the markers in row 17 of the set-up make a note of which one you come to row 10 k3 p1 k2 p2 twice k1 sl3wyif first on the increase rs row row 11 k3 m1 p1 k2 p2 twice k1 m1 sl3wyif abbreviations 18 sts k knit row 12 k3 p2 k2 3 times sl3wyif k2tog knit 2 stitches together a right-leaning row 13 k3 m1 p2 k2 3 times m1 sl3wyif 20 sts decrease row 14 k4 p2 k2 3 times p1 sl3wyif m1 make 1 an increase formed by picking up the strand between 2 sts and knitting it row 15 k3 m1 k1 p2 k2 3 times p1 m1 sl3wyif 22 sts throug the back loop if you prefer work m1l and m1r in pairs either way you ll have row 16 k5 p2 k2 3 times p2 sl3wyif a great scarf row 17 k3 m1 place marker k2 p2 4 times place p purl marker m1 sl3wyif 24 sts rs right side row 18 20 22 24 26 28 30 32 knit to marker k2 p2 4 times knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif sl3wyf slip 3 sts purl-wise with yarn in front ssk slip slip knit slip each of next 2 sts row 19 21 23 25 27 29 31 k3 m1 knit to marker k2 p2 4 times knit to last 3 sts m1 sl3wyif knitwise then pass them back to lefthand 38 sts needle and knit them together through the back loop a left-leaning decrease main scarf st s stitch es row 1-10 knit to marker k2 p2 4 times knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif ws wront side row 11 rs cable crossing knit to first marker slip reversible cable pattern next 8 sts to cable needle and hold to front k2 p2 16 sts 12 row 2 times from left needle k2 p2 2 times from cable row 1-10 k2 p2 4 times needle knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif row 11 rs cable twist row slip first 8 sts to cable row 12 knit to first marker k2 p2 4 times knit to needle and hold to front k2 p2 twice from lh last 3 sts sl3wyif needle k2 p2 twice from cable needle repeat row 1-12 43 more times row 12 k2 p2 4 times sample scarf has a total of 45 cable crossings you instructions will need at least 3 5 grams/11 yards of the specified set up yarn to finish after working the last cable crossing if cast on 8 sts you have enough yarn go ahead and work one more repeat of row 1-12 row 1 & 2 k3 p1 k1 sl3wyif 8 sts repeat row 1-10 row 3 k3 m1 p1 k1 m1 sl3wyif 10 sts row 4 k3 p2 k2 sl3wyif page 2 of 3 ©2023 dana fehrenbach
